reviewText: It was so sad at the end but truly a piece of art.  I salute all the main characters, the director, writer and all the staffs that was involved in the making of this drama.  Bravo!

this drama is one of the best i have ever seen and its worth the 56 hours. it has romance, suspense, drama, comedy and the cast is one of the best in the industry.you will love the villains and the heroes. it won a couple of awards and they were well deserved. you will never regret getting this drama and its just wonderfully awesome.

For the best audio and video quality with the original broadcast English subtitles, look for 'Studio: MBC America' under Product Details. MBC America is the licensed US distributor for East of Eden. MBC America works from the original MBC-TV master recordings and hires professional translators for the broadcast subtitles, which are also used for the DVD release. Each episode runs about 60 minutes. East of Eden Vol. 1 contains Episodes 1-25; Volume 2 contains Episodes 26-56 and special features. D. Bannon was the subtitler for the MBC America broadcast and DVD release of East of Eden Vol. 2. He discusses subtitling episodes 33-56 of East of Eden in The Elements of Subtitles: A Practical Guide to the Art of Dialogue, Character, Context, Tone and Style in Subtitling.
